sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form class="px-4 mt-3">
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localNomeCompleto"
            label="Nome Completo"
            :rules="rules"
            required
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model.number="localTelefone"
            label="Telefone"
            required
            :rules="[numberRule]"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localUsuario"
            label="Usuário"
            :rules="rules"
            required
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="localSenha"
            label="Senha"
            :append-icon="show1 ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
            :type="show1 ? 'text' : 'password'"
            @click="show1 = !show1"
            counter
            required
            :rules="rules"
        />
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>
import RequestMethods from '@/mixins/RequestMethods'
import GenericMethods from '@/mixins/GenericMethods'

export default {
    name: 'CadastroUsuarioComponent',
    mixins: [RequestMethods, GenericMethods],
    data: () => ({
        localNomeCompleto: null,
        localTelefone: null,
        localUsuario: null,
        localSenha: null,
        localRepetirSenha: null,
        show1: false,
        show2: false,
        rules: [
            v => !!v || 'Campo Obrigatório.'
        ],
        numberRule: [ 
            v => /^\d+$/.test(v)||'This field only accept numbers'
        ],
    }), 
    methods: {
        Salvar() {
            this.RequestPost('Usuario',
            {
                Nome: this.localNomeCompleto,
                Ativo: true,
                DataCadastro: new Date().toISOString(),
                Login: this.localUsuario,
                Senha: this.localSenha,
                Telefone: this.localTelefone
            },
                (retorno) => this.RetornoUsuario(retorno), 
                (error) => this.RetornoErro(error),
                () => (this.loader = !this.loader))
        },

        RetornoUsuario(retorno) {
            debugger
        },
    },
    watch: {
        salvar(newValue) {
            debugger
            this.Salvar()
        },
        cancelar(newValue) {
            debugger
            this.localNomeCompleto = null
            this.localUsuario = null
            this.localSenha = null
            this.localTelefone = null
        }
    },
    props: {
        salvar: Boolean,
        cancelar: Boolean
    }
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
